perturbation.original_text: By execution of this Supplier/Subcontractor Contract (“Contract”), _______________ (“Supplier”)  agrees and acknowledges that: (i) all images and/or trademarks, including, but not limited to PLAYBOY, (the “Playboy Properties”) applied at the request of _______________ (“Purchaser”) to merchandise covered by this Contract are owned by Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. (“Playboy”), and when used upon merchandise means that such merchandise is sponsored, approved, recommended or sold by Playboy or its licensees; (ii) Supplier will not sell, ship or otherwise dispose of any such merchandise except upon the order of Purchaser or Playboy; (iii) Supplier will never make, cause others to make or assist others in making, any claim whatsoever to any or all of the Playboy Properties or any trademark, copyright, designation, name, phrase, design or symbol similar thereto in connection with the manufacture, advertising, promotion, sale or distribution of merchandise; and (iv) Supplier will defend, indemnify and hold harmless Purchaser and Playboy and the distributors and dealers and the officers and employees of each of the foregoing against all liability whatsoever which may be incurred by them or any of them as a result of any alleged defects in material or workmanship in the merchandise covered by this Contract.
perturbation.changed_text: By execution of this Vendor/Subcontractor Contract (“Contract”), _______________ (“Supplier”)  agrees and acknowledges that: (i) all images and/or trademarks, including, but not limited to PLAYBOY, (the “Playboy Properties”) applied at the request of _______________ (“Client”) to merchandise covered by this Contract are owned by Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. (“Playboy”), and when used upon merchandise means that such merchandise is sponsored, approved, recommended or sold by Playboy or its licensees; (ii) Supplier will not sell, ship or otherwise dispose of any such merchandise except upon the order of Client or Playboy; (iii) Supplier will never make, cause others to make or assist others in making, any claim whatsoever to any or all of the Playboy Properties or any trademark, copyright, designation, name, phrase, design or symbol similar thereto in connection with the manufacture, advertising, promotion, sale or distribution of merchandise; and (iv) Supplier will defend, indemnify and hold harmless Client and Playboy and the distributors and dealers and the officers and employees of each of the foregoing against all liability whatsoever which may be incurred by them or any of them as a result of any alleged defects in material or workmanship in the merchandise covered by this Contract.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Purchaser' and 'Client' are used interchangeably for the same entity. This introduces ambiguity because it's unclear if the obligations and rights assigned to each term are identical. Switching 'Supplier/Subcontractor' to 'Vendor/Subcontractor' without clear definitions creates confusion about the nature of the contractual relationship.

perturbation.original_text: Supplier agrees that no production or manufacture of any merchandise covered by this Contract will commence until this Contract has been signed, dated and returned by Supplier to Purchaser. Supplier further agrees that it will not produce, cause to be produced or assist in the production of more units than are specified by Purchaser nor will Supplier produce, cause to be produced or assist in the production of any product or item not specifically requested by Purchaser using any or all of the Playboy Properties or any trademark, copyright, designations, names, phrases, designs or symbols similar to any or all of the Playboy Properties during or at any time after the completion of merchandise requested by this Contract.
perturbation.changed_text: Supplier agrees that no production or manufacture of any merchandise covered by this Contract will commence until this Contract has been signed, dated and returned by Supplier to Client. Supplier further agrees that it will not produce, cause to be produced or assist in the production of more units than are specified by Customer nor will Supplier produce, cause to be produced or assist in the production of any product or item not specifically requested by Customer using any or all of the Playboy Properties or any trademark, copyright, designations, names, phrases, designs or symbols similar to any or all of the Playboy Properties during or at any time after the completion of merchandise requested by this Contract.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Purchaser', 'Client', and 'Customer' are used interchangeably. It's ambiguous who specifies the number of units or requests specific products. This could lead to disputes about order fulfillment.

perturbation.original_text: Supplier will, upon request from Purchaser or Playboy, deliver to Purchaser or will destroy in the presence of Purchaser or its representative(s), all molds, designs or any other elements used in reproducing any or all of the Playboy Properties.
perturbation.changed_text: Supplier will, upon request from Client or Playboy, deliver to Customer or will destroy in the presence of Client or its representative(s), all molds, designs or any other elements used in reproducing any or all of the Playboy Properties.
perturbation.explanation: The original terms 'Purchaser' is now replaced with both 'Client' and 'Customer'. This lack of consistency introduces uncertainty regarding to whom the Supplier must deliver materials, and who must be present during destruction. It might invalidate the legal procedure due to this inconsistency.
